Classes¶

Binomial¶

class nipy.algorithms.statistics.models.family.varfuncs.Binomial(n=1)[source]¶

Bases: object

Binomial variance function

p = mu / n; V(mu) = p * (1 - p) * n

INPUTS:

n – number of trials in Binomial

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

Power variance function:

V(mu) = fabs(mu)**power
